titles.title: Guaranteed Rural Housing Fairness Act
A bill to amend the Guaranteed Rural Housing Loan Program provisions of the Housing Act of 1949.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4898)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 4/26/1994--Introduced. Guaranteed Rural Housing Fairness Act - Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to modify pooling requirements for the guaranteed rural housing loan program.
